医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
子宫颈器官芯片为下一代宿主-微生物组相互作用研究铺平了道路一组研究人员开发了人体宫颈器官芯片来模拟宫颈界面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Cervix-organ-chips-pave-the-way-for-next- Generation-studies-on-host-microbiome-interactions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Cervix-organ-chips-pave-the-way-for-next- Generation-studies-on-host-microbiome-interactions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=034f088b-714e-4b7d-aaf6-006fea34cefb Tue, 04 Jun 2024 06:03:00 -0400 Cervix organ chips pave the way for next-generation studies on host-microbiome interactions
小鼠研究在细胞水平上确定了心力衰竭的性别差异研究人员研究了 db/db 小鼠醛固酮感染对 HFpEF 的影响，重点关注性别差异以及细胞内钙处理和心肌细胞电生理学的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Mouse-study-identizes-sex-differences-at-the-cellular-level-for-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Mouse-study-identizes-sex-differences-at-the-cellular-level-for-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea851632-3918-45b4-b660-93d5e0c0df31 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 05:38:00 -0400 Mouse study identifies sex differences at the cellular level for heart failure
SCIEX 在 ASMS 2024 上推出新的数据独立采集 ZT Scan DIA在 ASMS 2024 上，生命科学分析技术的全球领导者 SCIEX 推出了用于 LC-MS/MS 的 ZT Scan DIA，这是下一代数据独立采集 (DIA)，利用四极杆维度与丰富的 MS2 数据的组合可以从芝诺陷阱中获得。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/SCIEX-launches-new-data-independent-acquisition-ZT-Scan-DIA-at-ASMS-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/SCIEX-launches-new-data-independent-acquisition-ZT-Scan-DIA-at-ASMS-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ff75899-f2fc-4389-9d59-de4ada7af6d5 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 05:16:00 -0400 SCIEX launches new data independent acquisition, ZT Scan DIA, at ASMS 2024
SCIEX 7500+ 系统在 ASMS 2024 上发布在 ASMS 2024 上，生命科学分析技术的全球领导者 SCIEX 推出了 SCIEX 7500+ 系统，这是 SCIEX 定量产品组合中最新的质谱仪，它建立在可靠、灵敏的定量传统的基础上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/The-SCIEX-75002b-system-launches-at-ASMS-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/The-SCIEX-75002b-system-launches-at-ASMS-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0920705d-b3ad-4035-b1df-cdd4dd88f513 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 05:15:00 -0400 The SCIEX 7500+ system launches at ASMS 2024
SCIEX 和 Mass Analytica 合作开发人工智能定量软件在 ASMS 2024 上，生命科学分析技术的全球领导者 SCIEX 与 Mass Analytica 合作，展示了人工智能定量 (AI quant) 软件。 AI 量化利用人工智能和机器学习的功能来处理数据并在短时间内产生见解，从而释放操作员时间并提高生产力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/SCIEX-and-Mass-Analytica-collaborate-to-advance-artificial-intelligence-quantitation-software.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/SCIEX-and-Mass-Analytica-collaborate-to-advance-artificial-intelligence-quantitation-software.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b50f9652-5518-41c5-91b2-4107108ec0f1 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 05:14:00 -0400 SCIEX and Mass Analytica collaborate to advance artificial intelligence quantitation software
N95 呼吸器是疗养院和医疗机构在呼吸道病毒感染期间的潜在护理标准研究人员检查了外科口罩、织物口罩、N95 呼吸器和 KN95 呼吸器在降低 COVID-19 患者呼出气溶胶样本中 SARS-CoV-2 病毒载量方面的效率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/N95-respirators-pottial-standard-of-care-in-nursing-homes-and-healthcare-settings-during-respiratory-viral-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/N95-respirators-pottial-standard-of-care-in-nursing-homes-and-healthcare-settings-during-respiratory-viral-infections.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc93cba8-342c-45ea-b24b-39044b640201 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 04:59:00 -0400 N95 respirators potential standard of care in nursing homes and healthcare settings during respiratory viral infections
Sphere Fluidics 推出 Cyto-CellectPLUS 以加速细胞系开发工作流程下一代检测提供了一种快速且经济高效的解决方案来量化单细胞中 IgG 的产生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Sphere-Fluidics-launches-Cyto-CellectPLUS-to-accelerate-cell-line-development-workflows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Sphere-Fluidics-launches-Cyto-CellectPLUS-to-accelerate-cell-line-development-workflows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2518ee8-ec25-4eea-9a00-b8220ce2054f Tue, 04 Jun 2024 04:33:00 -0400 Sphere Fluidics launches Cyto-CellectPLUS to accelerate cell line development workflows
发现针对致命细菌而不损害肠道微生物群的抗生素洛拉米星研究人员发现洛拉霉素是一种选择性革兰氏阴性抗生素，可有效对抗多重耐药病原体，同时不损害肠道微生物组。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Discovery-of-antibiotic-lolamicin-that-targets-deadly-bacteria-without-harming-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Discovery-of-antibiotic-lolamicin-that-targets-deadly-bacteria-without-harming-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad3d7ab8-5834-4dea-bd16-f8bae19cd8ff Tue, 04 Jun 2024 01:05:00 -0400 Discovery of antibiotic lolamicin that targets deadly bacteria without harming gut microbiome
年轻骨髓移植有望逆转小鼠阿尔茨海默病症状研究人员发现，年轻的骨髓移植可以使衰老的免疫细胞恢复活力，减轻小鼠模型中的阿尔茨海默氏症症状，这表明该疾病的潜在治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Young-bone-marrow-transplants-show-promise-in-reversing-Alzheimers-symptoms-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Young-bone-marrow-transplants-show-promise-in-reversing-Alzheimers-symptoms-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b507042-f959-4fd9-9430-afa52b98126f Tue, 04 Jun 2024 00:39:00 -0400 Young bone marrow transplants show promise in reversing Alzheimer's symptoms in mice
家族罕见的端粒突变揭示了端粒灵活性和疾病的新见解研究人员在一个家族中发现了一种罕见的端粒突变（TTAGGT），表明人类端粒可以容忍非规范序列，从而影响端粒维持和疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Familys-rare-telomere-mutation-reveals-new-insights-into-telomere-flexibility-and-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Familys-rare-telomere-mutation-reveals-new-insights-into-telomere-flexibility-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48339554-2efc-4051-9989-35dbcf6cd199 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 00:08:00 -0400 Family's rare telomere mutation reveals new insights into telomere flexibility and disease
